name: Swappery
description:
Navigate through rooms and collect keys to clear them. Try to beat all the levels and escape the realm of dreams!

WARNING: For the best experience, please play using Google Chrome or one of the desktop versions below!

Controls

WASD, G, R and Mouse

Team

Vinicius Garcia (@vinimunch) - Coding, Project Architecture, Animations

Pedro Marques (@pvitormn ) - Game Design, Level Design

Lucas Cordeiro (@lcscrdr) - Pixel Art, Animations

Jack Eyres (@eyres_jack) - Composition, Sound Design
